messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Fwd: Peacemaker cast announced
messages.msgSnippet: Forgot to mention... information on the VAs can be found at Crystal Acids English Voice Actor and Production Staff Database:
messages.messageBody:
Forgot to mention... information on the VAs can be found at Crystal Acids English Voice Actor and Production Staff Database: http://www.crystalacids.com/database/ .

spiritus saitou <spiritus_saitou@...> wrote:Came into my inbox this morning... Some of you may hate them, but I'm glad for voice actors. :-D (advvas is the group for ADV Films voice actors.)

phil

To: advvas@yahoogroups.com
From: "tifsfan"
Date: Fri, 30 Jul 2004 07:39:27 -0000
Subject: [advvas] Peacemaker cast announced

Here is the cast for ADVs upcoming dub of Peacmaker:

Luci Christian-Tetsu
Vic Mignonga-Tatsu
Mike Vance-Father
John Swasey-Kondo
Monica Rial-Saizo & Saya
Jason Douglas-Sanosuke
Greg Ayres-Shinpachi
Braden Hunt-Souji
Chris Patton-Susumu
Christine Auten-Ayumu
Kevin Corn-Suzu
Mike McRae-Toshi
Rob Mungle-Hajime
John Gremilion-Toshimaru
